kbp2013.managedocuments

Class NormalizedWebDoc

  • java.lang.Object
    • kbp2013.managedocuments.NormalizedWebDoc

  • public class NormalizedWebDoc
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hosts various methods for cleaning web docs: - remove | replace web special strings (ex: smileys) - remove | replace HTML reserved chars (ex: &)
    Author:
    mariejeanmeurs, method replaceSpecialCharacters from CUNY added by ericcharton

      static java.lang.String ReplaceHtmlGreekLetter(java.lang.String content)
      Remove | replace HTML Greek Letters Warning: letters are replaced with their full names Default replacement is " "
      static java.lang.String ReplaceHtmlMathSymbol(java.lang.String content)
      Remove | replace HTML Math Symbols Warning: most of these symbols are replaced with their full names Default replacement is " "

      static java.lang.String replaceSpecialCharacters(java.lang.String html)
      Handles special characters in HTML documents by replacing sequences of the form &...; by the corresponding characters.

      • replaceSpecialCharacters

        public static java.lang.String replaceSpecialCharacters(java.lang.String html)
        Handles special characters in HTML documents by replacing sequences of the form &...; by the corresponding characters. This class comes from CUNY HTMLConverter.java
        Parameters:

        Returns:
